vulcan_ROM.description:
● Strong Integrity
● Ringtone picker fixed (secsound)
● Google Assistant voice commands fixed
● Snapchat camera fixed
● More detailed battery infomation
● DressRoom ambient mode added
● Sketch to image (In gallery and notes)
● Portrait affects
vulcan_ROM.heading: What's New?

bootloader_warning_remover.brief: Removes the unlocked bootloader warning message.
bootloader_warning_remover.description: This bootloader remover is made by corsicanu, you can find the github here -> https://github.com/corsicanu/TWRP_Bootlogo_patcher/
bootloader_warning_remover.heading: Credits

colourfull_boot_animation.brief: Custom boot animation made by Luphaestus.
colourfull_boot_animation.description: If you would like to add your own image, message in the telegram group
colourfull_boot_animation.heading: Contribution

S8_boot_animation.brief: Custom boot animation from Samsung S8.
S8_boot_animation.description: If you would like to add your own image, message in the telegram group
